inputs.selection_motivation: CVD Aerospace and Defense and Kratos Defense & Security Solutions are both major defense contractors with overlapping product lines in missile defense and aerospace systems, positioning them as direct competitors.
inputs.candidate_motivation: These topics are the strongest direct or policy-driven connections to aerospace and defense, including major defense primes, space programs, and export controls that would influence demand, budgets, and supply chains for CVD Aerospace and Defense.

proposed_link.motivation: CVD Aerospace and Defense and Kratos Defense & Security Solutions are both major defense contractors with overlapping product lines in missile defense and aerospace systems, positioning them as direct competitors.
